title: Requires that an application for medical assistance be filed for every inmate confined to a state or local correctional facility
summary: Requires the superintendent of each department of correctional services facility to ensure that an application for medical assistance is filed for each inmate not less than 90 days prior to the inmate's release from such facility; requires the head of each local correctional facility to ensure that an application for medical assistance is filed, within 7 days of commitment, for each inmate sentenced to confinement for more than 30 days.
